channel.title: My Delta 317 problems!
channel.description:
Can you get me the yell code ? And i have the ::npc in client but it dont work :-s I know it isnt permanent but i want maybe il need Sad
Oh and you can tell me where i put yell command ? there is my client.java : http://rapidshare.com/files/330628858/client.java.html
Oh and you know how i make players drop items when they die at monsters ?
They drop all stuff only when pk...when die from a monster they don't lose they'r stuff ~!~
Ahh and where i change the special ?
Magic bow and dark bow take 3 specials and AGS only 2 ... where i change ? Please help me
Thx for read !

item.title: My Delta 317 problems!
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

for the yell part

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { if (playerLevel[??] >= 99 && playerLevel[??] >= 99) { rest of your yell command here } }

xp rate, look at the bottem of the booleans
attackNPC and attack

for the specials, look in your attacking methods (stated above) and find that weapon
should look something liek

if (playerEquipment[playerweapon] == DARK BOW && specAmount >= ??) {
speical stuff…
specialAmount -= ??;
}

the question marks are where the things that need to be changed involving your problems are at

Read full topic

item.title: My Delta 317 problems!
item.dc:creator: @ImperiuM ImperiuM
item.description:
@ImperiuM wrote:

I get 2 errors :mad:

client.java:8008: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client sendMessage(playerName + ": " ^ client.java:8016: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client sendMessage(playerName + ": " + command.substri ng(5)); ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: My Delta 317 problems!
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Why can’t you add it in yourself? Here take the command and just paste it in your client java somewhere.
Oh fk… here…

Search for this code in your client.java, it should be in Delta, I have the same source.

private void customCommand(String command) {

Under that add

if (command.startsWith("yell") && (command.length() > 5)) { if (!muted) { String text = command.substring(5); String[] bad = { "chalreq", "duelreq", "tradereq" }; for (String element : bad) { if (text.indexOf(element) >= 0) { return; } } lastMessage[0] = lastMessage[1]; lastMessage[1] = lastMessage[2]; lastMessage[2] = Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1); if (lastMessage[0].equals(lastMessage[1]) && lastMessage[1].equals(lastMessage[2])) sendMessage(playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); else yell(playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else sendMessage(playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));

Meh if this doesn’t work tell me. Oh crap shit soz whale balls LOL. At the end of that code press enter, you need to add a “{”.

Read full topic
